channel.title: Getting Server so other people can use?
channel.description: I have wireless. So I use himachi, but no one still can get on. I have no idea what is wrong, help would greatly be appreciated..

item.title: Getting Server so other people can use?
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

For creating a network you should be the one running the server.

Click “Create Network”

Enter the name of networks that relates to your servers name.
Example
Testscape1
Testscape2
Testscape3

Pass- test

For joining a server’s hamachi network. “Join Network”

Then enter the Hamachi name that it tells you.

Enter the password it says.

Example
TestScape

Hamachi Networks
Testscape1
Testscape2
Testscape3

Pass- test

Read full topic
item.source: Getting Server so other people can use?
